name: Cloud Giant
description: Cloud Giants are towering, majestic beings with pale, almost translucent skin and hair that billows as though caught in a breeze. They live among the clouds in vast floating castles.
memorable: Known for their ability to control the weather, summon thunderstorms, and hurl lightning bolts, Cloud Giants can be either benevolent or tyrannical rulers.
goals: They treasure wealth, particularly valuable objects and rare gemstones, and often rule over smaller creatures from their cloud castles.
relations: Related to other giant races and may command lesser beings or creatures that reside in the clouds.
environment: Found in floating castles among the clouds and high altitudes.
strengths: Possesses exceptional Strength and Constitution, making them formidable opponents in melee and spellcasting.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to being knocked prone, which could exploit its mobility advantage.
attacks: Utilizes a powerful glaive for melee attacks and can throw large rocks as ranged attacks, dealing substantial slashing and bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Can control the weather, significantly impacting the battlefield and creating storms.
senses: Has keen smell, increasing its perception when relying on scent, along with Cloud Sight allowing it to see through obscured areas.
skills: Shows proficiency in insight, perception, and persuasion, enabling it to engage effectively both in combat and social interactions.
additional_information: Can create heavily obscured areas with fog cloud
Empowered melee attacks with multiattack capability
Strong presence due to high Charisma
Resistance to lightning and thunder damage
Ability to teleport short distances with Misty Step
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster with a variety of spells focused on weather control and battlefield manipulation.
test_queries: majestic giant that controls the weather
giant with lightning abilities living in the clouds
aristocratic giant with immense physical power
cloud-covered giant that creates fog in battle
